    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static KProgressHUD create(Context context)
        Create a new HUD. Have the same effect as the constructor. For convenient only.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity context that the HUD bound to
        Returns:
        An unique HUD instance

      • setStyle

        public KProgressHUD setStyle(KProgressHUD.Style style)
        Specify the HUD style (not needed if you use a custom view)
        Parameters:
        style - One of the KProgressHUD.Style values
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setDimAmount

        public KProgressHUD setDimAmount(float dimAmount)
        Specify the dim area around the HUD, like in Dialog
        Parameters:
        dimAmount - May take value from 0 to 1. 0 means no dimming, 1 mean darkness
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setWindowColor

        public KProgressHUD setWindowColor(int color)
        Specify the HUD background color
        Parameters:
        color - ARGB color
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setCornerRadius

        public KProgressHUD setCornerRadius(float radius)
        Specify corner radius of the HUD (default is 10)
        Parameters:
        radius - Corner radius in dp
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setAnimationSpeed

        public KProgressHUD setAnimationSpeed(int scale)
        Change animate speed relative to default. Only have effect when use with indeterminate style
        Parameters:
        scale - 1 is default, 2 means double speed, 0.5 means half speed..etc.
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setLabel

        public KProgressHUD setLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Optional label to be displayed on the HUD
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setDetailsLabel

        public KProgressHUD setDetailsLabel(java.lang.String detailsLabel)
        Optional detail description to be displayed on the HUD
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setMaxProgress

        public KProgressHUD setMaxProgress(int maxProgress)
        Max value for use in one of the determinate styles
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(int progress)
        Set current progress. Only have effect when use with a determinate style, or a custom view which implements Determinate interface.

      • setCustomView

        public KProgressHUD setCustomView(View view)
        Provide a custom view to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        view - Must not be null
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setCancellable

        public KProgressHUD setCancellable(boolean isCancellable)
        Specify whether this HUD can be cancelled by using back button (default is false)
        Returns:
        Current HUD

      • setAutoDismiss

        public KProgressHUD setAutoDismiss(boolean isAutoDismiss)
        Specify whether this HUD closes itself if progress reaches max. Default is true.
        Returns:
        Current HUD
